![](https://www.gestiondbi.com/img/companyLogo.png)

You need a powerful VPS hosted on quality hardware and network? Want to use your own Operating System or/and Windows? Check our new KVM VDS offers!

**Please take note, all price below are in Canadian Dollars.**

<hr>

**LAUNCHING PROMOTION KVM VDS PLAN**

* CPU: 1 vCore
* Fair Share CPU Usage
* RAM: 768MB
* Hard Drive: 60GB
* IPv4: 1 + IPv6 Subnet
* Bandwidth: 1TB/month at 1Gbps
* SLA of 99.95% + DDos Protection

**Price: $6/month (~4.50USD)**  
Order link: http://gdbi.pw/vds768 (Few units left)


**KVM-VDS-1GB-MTL**


* CPU: 1 vCore
* Fair Share CPU Usage
* RAM: 1 GB
* Hard Drive: 20GB
* IPv4: 1 + IPv6 subnet
* Bandwidth: 1TB/month at 1Gbps
* SLA of 99.95% + DDos Protection
* We offer weekly terms on all our KVM VDS regular plans!

**Price: $7/month (~5.30USD) -- Buy yearly and get 1 month free!**  
Order link: http://gdbi.pw/vds1

<hr>

<pre>
Our KVM VDS are available in the following locations:

Montreal, Quebec, Canada
Los Angeles, USA (Almost sold out, contact our sales team to request)
Paris, France, EU location soon! Feel free to pre-order via our sales team!
</pre>

<hr> 

Do not forget to check our others plans!

- DeepNet Solutions LowEnd VPS: https://www.deepnetsolutions.com/openvz-vps.html
- Gestion DBI Premium OpenVZ VPS: https://www.gestiondbi.com/en/openvzvps
- All our KVM VDS plans: https://www.gestiondbi.com/en/kvmvds
<hr> 

* We accept TOR Relay on our Dedicated IPv4 VPS. Read AuP for more information
* We accept Paypal, Credit Card, 2Checkout, Bitcoin and Interac e-transfer (Canadian citizens only)
* Looking Glass: https://www.gestiondbi.com/en/faq
* We speak French and English. You can reach us 24/7, via the following link: http://gdbi.pw/contact

Regards, David.
